context: In 2010, the company was known as Roper Industries, Inc. (name changed to Roper Technologies in April 2015). Roper operated as a diversified industrial company with focus on engineered products across multiple segments. Founded by George D. Roper in 1890, headquartered in Sarasota, FL.
